name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (DomTheDev)
description:
Dungeon Escape is a short and simple 3D puzzle game made using Unreal Engine 5. The aim of the game is to escape the dungeon by solving puzzles and passing obstacles.

Controls

  • WSAD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Hold Left Click to grab
  • ESC to quit

This project was made whilst following the GameDev.tv course Unreal Engine 5 C++ Developer during the Crypt Raider section. This section of the course covered lighting, C++ components, sphere sweeps, grabbing objects with physics handle and trigger boxes.

Once the section was completed, I added some features of my own to further push my learning. These include the green object outline when the object is grab-able, sound effects, moving pillars, cell door and key mechanics and the end game trigger and UI.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
